author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CRG Announces $57 Mln Sale Of Build-To-Suit For Shaw Industries Group In Savannah
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - CRG:
* CRG - ANNOUNCED SALE OF ITS 1 MILLION SQUARE FOOT BUILD-TO-SUIT FACILITY IN SAVANNAH, GEORGIA FOR SHAW INDUSTRIES GROUP TO GRIFFIN CAPITAL CO FOR $57 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
